title: When You Say Nothing At All
lyrics:
[intro] | (G)  (D) | (C)  (D) |  x2
 
(G) It's (D)amazing how (C)you can speak (D)right to my (G)heart (D)  (C)  (D)
(G) Without (D)saying a (C)word, you can (D)light up the (G)dark (D)  (C)  (D)
(C)Try as I may I can (D)never explain
(G) What I (D)hear when you (C)don't say a (D)thing (D)
 
[chorus]
The (G)smile on your (D)face lets me (C)know that you (D)need me
There's a (G)truth in your (D)eyes, saying (C)you'll never (D)leave me
The (G)touch of your (D)hand says you'll (C)catch me wherever I (D)fall (C)  (D)
(C)You say it best, (D-hold) when you say nothing at all
 
[interlude] | (G)  (D) | (C)  (D) |  x2
 
(G) All day (D)long I can (C)hear people (D)talking out (G)loud (D)  (C)  (D)
(Em) But when (Bm)you hold me (C)near, you (D)drown out the (G)crowd (D)  (C)  (D)
(C)Try as they may they can (D)never define
(G) What's been (D)said between (C)your heart and (D)mine
 
[chorus]
The (G)smile on your (D)face lets me (C)know that you (D)need me
There's a (G)truth in your (D)eyes, saying (C)you'll never (D)leave me
The (G)touch of your (D)hand says you'll (C)catch me wherever I (D)fall (C)  (D)
(C)You say it best, (D-hold) when you say nothing at all
 
[solo] | (E)  (B) | (A)  (B) |  x3
           | (A)        | (B)        |
 
[chorus]
The (G)smile on your (D)face lets me (C)know that you (D)need me
There's a (G)truth in your (D)eyes, saying (C)you'll never (D)leave me
The (G)touch of your (D)hand says you'll (C)catch me wherever I (D)fall (C)  (D)
(C)You say it best, (D-hold) when you say nothing at all
 
[outro] | (G)  (D) | (C)  (D) |  x2
(G-single strum) [end]
